channel.title: How to Make a Command?
channel.description:
How do I make a command work on another person?
Ex.
::setmodel PlayerName 8102
And the PlayerName is the name of the person I want to set the model of?
I know how to make them be that model, I just need to know how to make it work on other people.

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

By not working I mean I get disconnected every time I use one.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“The Dark Abbys, post:10, topic:193789”]Hey there, how about trying this m8

if (command.startsWith("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >= PLAYERRIGHTSREQUIRED) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.sendMessage("You have been touched in naughty ways by "+playerName+"!"); }

Goodluck and bestwishes :)[/quote]

Wonder where you got that code from?

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I don’t see any ‘c’'s before that type of text in any other command like the one I’m trying to make.

Another update: All my other-person commands aren’t working. o.O

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make a Command?

item.description:

Where’d ya leech that from ? XD

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hey there, how about trying this m8

if (command.startsWith("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >= PLAYERRIGHTSREQUIRED) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.sendMessage("You have been touched in naughty ways by "+playerName+"!"); }

Goodluck and bestwishes

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

No… I’m fairly certain its c.text…

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:6, topic:193789”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=257959.msg2142410#msg2142410 date=1206756428]
Every time I try the command… I get DC’ed…

if(command.startsWith("testt")) { String name = command.substring(6); client text = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; text.sendMessage("I know where you live."); }

Any idea why?
[/quote]

I believe it should be c.text?[/quote]Don’t think that would do anything but cause errors…

Updated: This problem seems to be effecting all my ‘Use on Other People’ commands, such as ::rep, ::eat… And others…

Read full topic

item.description:

M34N5 H3 WNT5 T0 B3 T3H M0D3L.

[quote=“zubmage, post:3, topic:193789”][quote author=whosdr link=topic=257959.msg2142350#msg2142350 date=1206755256]
can i have the command? i will have a look too. please i will adapt well for you.
[/quote]

Leecher?[/quote]

item.title: How to Make a Command?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

whosdr:

can i have the command? i will have a look too. please i will adapt well for you.

Leecher?

Anyway:

if (command.startsWith("~~~~")) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.(Add stuff here e.g victim.applyDead();)

I don’t understand what you mean by setmodel :S

Read full topic
